body: As usual the art is top tier! Even though the story is super cliché, in my head I'm thinking why not just tell someone you got raped by the girls boyfriend. But then I remember it's a hentai manga and then it makes sense. xD

In this first chapter, MC wasn't a fail. He had no way of knowing what was going on and his girlfriend said nothing nor gave any signs of irregularities. In chapter 2  MC goes full cuck and does everything wrong. RIP. Also the art is gorgeous
the guy's feeling sorry while he didn't know she's getting fucked violated everyday and liking it

The Art is superb and top tier if I had to compare with other manhwas drawn in this style, however, there are many strong competitors out there which produce a little inferior art compared to this but quantity is overflowing. For some reason, This art style is more arousing than some others I have seen. The story is decent, I personally don't care if it's NTR but I can kind of predict where will this go.

Anyway, keep up the good work!
Art is so fucking hot! I fapped!
And now i thought my heart would break until... she feel pleasure.. bruh
Great style and art just and ntr not spicy enought to made it brokenheart,also iam not fan of ntr or vanilla if it art great i like it if story not to trashy
